recipe_name: Tomato, blue cheese and kidney bean salad
author: Brian Turner
method: Mix the kidney beans, onion, chives, lemon juice, salt and freshly ground black pepper together in a small bowl.  Heat a dash of olive oil in a frying pan, add the bread cubes and fry for 2-3 minutes, or until golden-brown. To serve, place the sliced tomato on a serving plate, top with the kidney bean salad and scatter over the cheese and toasted bread cubes.
